attributes.action: Financially compensate families for the stress and worry caused by missing discs and his resignation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I felt violated even before I knew my name and details were on the missing discs. This is not only gross misconduct and total incompetance, but also an invasion of privacy.

Now that I have been informed that I am indeed on the missing disc, I feel distraught at the kind of details that can be in 'anyone's' hands and if not used now can be used many years down the line.

I feel compensation is due and Browns' resignation asked for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
